item.description:
Join Permaculture Designer David Homa and Gretchen Voight of Post Carbon Designs and Resilient Roots for a discussion on regenerative, self-regulating, bee friendly landscapes using Permaculture design principles.An informative workshop for beekeepers looking to further support the health and sustainability of their hives reducing the need to feed or medicate. Not a beekeeper? We will cover how to attract and support wild bees in your landscape.

 

 

Topics include:
- Pollen/nectar sources throughout the seasons
- Polycultures and food forest gardening
- Stacking plant functions
- Pest deterrents and beneficial plantings for our hives

Coffee and Tea will be provided. $15

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Bee Friendly Permaculture Landscapes
